entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: University of Victoria 10:00 PM PST Tuesday 03 January 2023

Humidity: 86 %

Wind: NNE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Wind light except east 30 km/h gusting to 60 near the water this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning except northeast 40 near Juan de Fuca Strait late in the morning and in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 60%
